title: The Music Festival : Episode 30
description:
As the UK summer hots up, for many people weekends are spent at music festivals enjoying the bands and relaxed vibe with friends.  In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast, we look at the events at a smaller Essex festival, Brownstock.  Two men arrived at the event with their friends to have fun but both were dead by the end of the festival.  Why?
